column2: "Ɔhen Belsazar n'ahendzi a otsia ebiasa no mu no
column3: emi mara Daniel nyaa enyido adzehu bi wɔ kan dza woyii kyerɛɛ me no ekyir."

column2: "Na muhunii wɔ enyido adzehu mu; dɛ
column3: nna mowɔ Susan ahemfie a ɔwɔ Elam ɔmansin mu no mu; na mowɔ esutsen Ulai ho."

column2: "Nna memaa m'enyi do na hwɛ
column3: oguannyin a ɔwɔ mmbɛn ebien gyina esu no ano: na mmbɛn ebien no wowar; na kor war sen kor
column4: na dza ɔwar no na odzii ekyir firii."

column2: "Muhun oguannyin no dɛ ɔresesɛ kɔ anee
column3: kwaamu na pomu afamu; na mbowa biara nntum nngyina n'enyim
column4: eso obiara nnyi hɔ a otum gye obi fi ne nsamu; na ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ na ohuhoor noho."

column2: "Na morodwendwen ho no
column3: hwɛ
column4: apɔnkyenyin fi anee nam asaase enyi bae
column5: na no ho nnka famu: na apɔnkye no wɔ ambɛn kɛse bi a osi n'enyiwa ntamu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa oguannyin a ɔwɔ mmbɛn ebien a muhun no dɛ ogyina esutsen no ano no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔdze n'ahoɔdzen ebufuhyew tutuu mbirika kɛhyɛɛ oguannyin no do."

column2: "Na muhun dɛ opiin oguannyin no nkyɛn
column3: na n'enyi beer no do
column5: na obubuu ne mmbɛn ebien no; na ahoɔdzen bi nnyi oguannyin no mu dɛ ɔdze begyina n'enyim; na ɔtoow no kyeen famu
column7: na obi nnyi hɔ a otumii gyee oguannyin no fii ne nsamu."

column2: "Na apɔnkyenyin no huhoor noho mbordo: na ɔtraa do no
column3: ambɛn kɛse no bui; na mmbɛn akɛse anan besisii ananmu kyerɛkyerɛɛ ɔsor mframa anan no do."

column2: "Na ambɛn kakraba kor bi fi hɔn mu firii a ɔyɛɛ kɛse mbordo kɔr pomu afamu
column3: na boka afamu
column4: na asaase fɛɛfɛw no no do."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ kɛse kɛpeem ɔsor dɔm mpo do; na ɔtoow dɔm no na nworaba no mu bi guguu famu
column3: na otsiatsiaa hɔn do."

column2: "Nyew
column3: ɔmemaa noho do kodur dɔm no safohen no do mpo; na ɔgyee daa ɔhyew afɔr no fii ne nsamu
column4: na wɔtoow no krɔnkrɔn bea no kyeen famu."

column2: "Na wɔdze dɔm no kaa daa ɔhyew afɔr no ho maa no wɔ mbrato mu; na ɔtoow nokwar kyeen famu na ɔyɛɛ n'apɛdze na ɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm."
"Nna metsee dɛ ɔkrɔnkrɔnnyi bi rekasa; na ɔkrɔnkrɔnnyi fofor bi so see ɔbaako a ɔrekasa no dɛ
column3: Dabɛn na daa ɔhyew afɔr na amamfoyɛ mbrato a wɔdze krɔnkrɔnbea na dɔm no maa dɛ wɔmfa anan ntsiatsia do no ho enyido adzehu no besi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Obekesi ewimbir na anapa mpem ebien ahaebiasa; ansaana wɔatsew krɔnkrɔnbea no ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a emi mara Daniel morohwehwɛ dɛ mebɛtse ase; no
column3: awerɛfir mu ara hwɛ
column4: obi beyii noho gyinaa m'enyim dɛ banyin."

column2: "Na metsee nyimpa ndze wɔ Ulai nsu kɔn do ntamu a ɔfrɛe see dɛ
column3: Gabriel
column4: ma banyin yi ntse enyido adzehu no ase."

column2: "Nna ɔbɛɛn mbrɛ migyinae no; na ɔbae no
column3: mobɔɔ hu
column4: na medze m'enyim butuuw famu: na ɔsee me dɛ
column6: tse ase; na enyido adzehu no fa ewiei ber no ho."

column2: "Na ɔnye me rekasa no
column3: motɔɔ nda heii

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: merema ehu dza ɔbɛba ekyir ebufuw ber no mu: na ɔfa ewiei ber a wɔahyɛ no ho."

column2: "Oguannyin a ihunii a ɔwɔ mmbɛn ebien no
column3: hɔn nye Media na Persia ahemfo"

column2: "Na apɔnkyenyin wirikyee no nye Griisen: na ambɛn kɛse a osi n'enyiwa ntamu no ɔnye ɔhen a odzi kan."
"Na dza obui a anan besisii ananmu no
column3: ahendzi anan bɔsoɛr efi ɔman no mu
column4: na no mu biara no tum nnkɔto kan dze no."

column2: "Na hɔn ahendzi n'ekyir ber no a mbrato ewie mayɛ no
column3: ɔhen a n'enyim yɛ hu a ɔtse nsɛm a no mu yɛ sum ase bɔsoɛr."

column2: "Na no tum bɛyɛ dzen
column3: naaso nnyɛ noara no tum a: na ɔbɛsɛɛ adze nwanwa na oedzi yie na ɔayɛ n'apɛdze: na ɔbɛsɛɛ ahoɔdzenfo na akrɔnkrɔmfo no."

column2: "Na n'enyitsew ntsi ɔbɛma ndaadaa edzi yie wɔ ne nsamu; na ɔbɛmema noho do wɔ n'akoma mu
column3: na hɔn sɔkyeeyɛ no mu
column4: ɔbɛsɛɛ piinara: ɔbɔsoɛr etsia ahen mu hen no so; na ɔnodze wobobu no a wɔnndze nyimpa nsa."

column2: "Na ewimbir ewimbir na anapa anapa enyido adzehu a wɔkae no
column3: yɛ nokwar: na ɔwo dze
column4: tow enyido adzehu no mu; na ɔfa mber pii a ɔreba ho."

column2: "Na emi Daniel
column3: adze bɔɔ mo do
column4: na meyaar nda bi; nna mosoɛree
column5: na meyɛɛ ɔhen n'edwuma: na enyido adzehu no yɛɛ me ahobow
